Question
========

For a one-tailed distribution skewed to the right, the mean is

Answerlist
----------

* Smaller than the median
* Greater than the mode
* Equal to the mode

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Smaller than the median: Incorrect
* Greater than the mode: Correct
* Equal to the mode: Incorrect
